articles.title: Samsung Display’s new QD-OLED panel can hit 1,000 nits brightness for improved HDR - The Verge
articles.description: Key specs for Samsung Display’s new QD-OLED TVs have been revealed by certification company SGS. The new panels can hit a peak brightness of over 1,000 nits, and display over 90 percent of the BT.2020 color space.
articles.content:
SGS certification confirms
Samsung Displays new panels combine a self-emissive layer with quantum dots.
Image: Samsung Display
